gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 118, Bulls 109
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Bulls, 118-109. Spencer Dinwiddie recorded 24 points, seven assists, and five rebounds for the Nets, with Royce O'Neale (20 points, six 3PM) and Lonnie Walker IV (20 points, six 3PM) in the victory. DeMar DeRozan tallied 27 points, six rebounds, and six assists for the Bulls in the defeat. The Nets improve to 8-8 in the regular season, while the Bulls fall to 5-13.
